author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Fifteen! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

It's the PATRON PICK OF THE WEEK with Aetherpunk28. Love Ralph Bakshi's WIZARDS? Want to watch Darkwolf get blasted by Avatar with a .38? Then this game of Post Apocalyptic Wizard Combat is right for you. Check it out HERE:  https://www.wargamevault.com/product/463718/Aetherpunk28?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 015 - AETHERPUNK28
